titles: To the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons in the high court of Parliament now assembled the humble petition of the well affected prentices and yong-men of the City of London and suburbs.
notes: Praying Parliament "to leave no just way unatempted which may conduce to the settlement of differences."
Wing gives publication date 1642/3 but Thomason received his copy in December, 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
London (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
